selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute numeric expressions to determine angle measures.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to calculate the measure of angle H using known angles and geometric principles.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to format the selected multiple-choice option as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: analyze_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze the geometric diagram to extract relationships and constraints between angles.

tests.input: diagram with labeled points and angles

new_skill_specs.name: map_to_options
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the calculated angle measure to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
edge_cases: Calculated value not matching any option
Multiple options close to calculated value
